Ionic Framework

February 6th, 2016

Ionic framework is an extension of the Angular framework which enables angular developers to publish their work to mobile devices. As part of the Coursera full stack course I have been studying we are migrating the application we have been developing onto ionic. The result can be seen here and the source code for the site here
